name: New Labor Laws, Resources Focus of County/City Webinar
description: Local business owners and employers had a chance to learn about the new 2023 labor laws during a webinar Wednesday.
keywords: office of labor standards and enforcement

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Local business owners and employers had a chance to learn about the new 2023 labor laws during a webinar Wednesday.
The County Office of Labor Standards and Enforcement and the City of San Diego’s Office of Labor Standards Enforcement joined together to share information about the wage and labor laws enforced by their agencies.
The offices also explained how each operated and gave out resources, websites and contact information. About 250 people attended the webinar and more are planned in the future.
For details on Wednesday’s webinar, watch the video above.
